title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, create, and run large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server, published on npm.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama server, published on PyPI.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models as LangChain LLMs.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama, packaged as a Docker container.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java SDK for Ollama, available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced Node.js CLI wrapper around ollama-js with prompt templating.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose examples for running Ollama server and web-ui.

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home Assistant custom component exposing Ollama models as conversation agents.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI microservice template that proxies and extends Ollama endpoints.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-gpt-script
summary: GPTScript provider that lets you call Ollama models as tools with function-calling style.

title: ollama-chat-nextjs
summary: Minimal Next.js chat example using the official ollama-js client.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate wrapping the Ollama REST API with async/await.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama model replies into channels.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Community Elixir client for Ollama built with Finch and Jason.
